@everyone: You will have to clear the cache after installing the signal fix.. It is working for most of the people and files have been duly checked.
mr ahmad how can it be fixed with the file has errors on 7zip

@dmac6419, You must be doing something wrong as other people have got it to work fine. You need to extract the files to your desktop, enter the password when prompt, then copy and paste the files to your Railworks directory, overwrite any files if asked, then launch railworks, navigate to the tools and docs tab and click clear cache. If done correctly this will fix the missing signals.
If you can't extract the files for some reason, re-install 7zip or try Winrar
